Item_AD13_Desc: A long out of use accelerator model. However, it can still be quite precious.
Item_AccessCard_Desc: It definitely matches the door leading to the locked room in Ramsey's office.
Weapon_Pistol_Desc: A simple weapon that shoots pure energy.
Quest_KillVincent_Desc: Kill 'Amnesia' nightclub owner Vincent Ramsey at the request of his girlfriend, Nyx.
Quest_ZedAccelerator_Desc: Bring Zed an old model of an accelerator. In return you will receive a gun from him.
JournalEntry: New quest added to the journal:
SelectInvIndex: Select the index of the item you want to view.
StoryIntro02:
Megacity is a place overrun by poverty and feuding gangs, where powerful
	corporations have the most influence. The violence in the streets is a clear sign of
	an impending war. Government operating from behind the secure walls of City Hall are
	trying to combat this, but so far without success. There are rumors that they themselves
	are secretly supporting the chaos to create a New Order on the ruins of the city.
PrologueDream01: Standing at the edge of the tallest tower...
PrologueDream03: Falling and falling for what feels like hours...
WakeUpInDarkAlley_01: You wake up dazed from a restless slumber.
WakeUpInDarkAlley_02: It was the same dream again...
WakeUpInDarkAlley_03:
You are somewhere in a dark alley. Above your head, among the smoggy haze, as if torn from
	a dream, rise the monumental skyscrapers of large corporations.
WakeUpInDarkAlley_04:
Their divine majesty beats
	you to the eyes.
WakeUpInDarkAlley_05:
Your heart beats so hard that only the stinging touch of the wind protects you from a sudden
	heart attack.
WakeUpInDarkAlley_06:
Suddenly a wave of shivers comes over your body, you start shaking like an
	aspen, and realize that you are lying on a lair made of some old newspapers.
WakeUpInDarkAlley_07: When you rise from the ground, you notice a sea of trash around you.
WakeUpInDarkAlley_08:
It's full of cardboard
	boxes, old mechanical parts, and god knows what else.
WakeUpInDarkAlley_09: Maybe you will find something interesting there...
Menu1_1: Search the area for something valuable.
Menu1_2: Find the exit from the alley.
AcceleratorFinding_01: You start rummaging through the trash.
AcceleratorFinding_02:
The search takes a long while, but eventually you
	manage to find something.
InvTip:
[TIP: This item has been added to your inventory. You can view it in the text file in your
	game folder.]
AcceleratorFinding_03: Hmm, that might come in handy in the future.
RememberYourName:
Your name... You start wandering your thoughts around what your name is. As if through a fog
	it occurs to you that you are:
